property.name: BEFORE_NEW
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CONTEXT_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the active context changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Application becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the Application becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_QUIT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Application is quit. Allows the quit to be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_QUIT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the Application is quitting. Since the quit has been committed, it can not be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: exportForWebPreferences
property.shortdesc: The default export for web preferences.

property.name: allParagraphStyles
property.shortdesc: Lists all paragraph styles (regardless of their group).

property.name: allCharacterStyles
property.shortdesc: Lists all character styles (regardless of their group).

property.name: textWrapPreferences
property.shortdesc: The text wrap preference properties that define the default formatting for wrapping text around objects.

property.name: scriptArgs
property.shortdesc: Arguments to pass to a script.

property.name: pdfExportPreferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of PDF export preferences.

property.name: pdfPlacePreferences
property.shortdesc: The PDF place preference properties that define how PDF files are placed in the current document.

property.name: placeableFileExtensions
property.shortdesc: Lists the extensions of file types that can be placed.

property.name: placeableFileTypes
property.shortdesc: Lists the types of files that can be placed.

property.name: linkingPreferences
property.shortdesc: The links preference properties that define preferences for links.

property.name: grabberPreferences
property.shortdesc: Grabber preference properties that define display performance quality during scrolling.

property.name: indexGenerationOptions
property.shortdesc: The index options properties that define how an index is formatted.

property.name: incopyExportOptions
property.shortdesc: Export options for InCopy INCX document format.

property.name: imageIOPreferences
property.shortdesc: The image I/O preference properties that define preferences for importing images.

property.name: polygonPreferences
property.shortdesc: Polygon preference properties to use to define default settings for creating a polygon.

property.name: allObjectStyles
property.shortdesc: All object styles contained by the Application.

property.name: pageItemDefaults
property.shortdesc: The default page item formatting for the Application.

property.name: frameFittingOptions
property.shortdesc: The frame fitting option to apply to placed or pasted content. Can be applied to a frame, object style, or document or to the application.

property.name: unusedSwatches
property.shortdesc: The swatches that are not being used.

property.name: contentPlacer
property.shortdesc: The Content Placer. Used to get a reference to the content placer object.

property.name: colorSettings
property.shortdesc: Color setting properties that define color management defaults.

property.name: layoutGridData
property.shortdesc: Default properties specific to layout grids.

property.name: storyGridData
property.shortdesc: Default properties specific to frame grids.

property.name: gridPrintingPreferences
property.shortdesc: Grid printing preference and export settings.

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The full path to the Application, including the name of the Application.

property.name: filePath
property.shortdesc: The full path to the file.

property.name: activeScript
property.shortdesc: The current script running from the Scripts panel.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the Application is visible.

property.name: clipboardPreferences
property.shortdesc: Clipboard preference properties that define the way that the application interacts with the system clipboard.

property.name: transformPreferences
property.shortdesc: Transform preference properties that define default behaviors when transforming objects. Note: Transforming includes rotation, scaling, flipping, and shearing.

property.name: modalState
property.shortdesc: If true, a modal dialog or alert is active.

property.name: undoName
property.shortdesc: The name of the action on the top of the undo stack.

property.name: redoName
property.shortdesc: The name of the action on the top of the redo stack.

property.name: undoHistory
property.shortdesc: The names of the items in the undo stack.

property.name: redoHistory
property.shortdesc: The names of the items in the redo stack.

property.name: activeScriptUndoMode
property.shortdesc: The undo mode for the current script execution.

property.name: allPreflightObjectTypes
property.shortdesc: The list of all object types (strings) a preflight rule can operate on.

property.name: allPreflightRuleCategories
property.shortdesc: The list of all categories that have been declared by rules.

property.name: allPreflightRuleIDs
property.shortdesc: The list of all known (declared) rule IDs.

property.name: dataMergeOptions
property.shortdesc: The data merge option properties that define the data merge.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Application (a Application).

property.name: xmlExportMaps
property.shortdesc: A collection of XML export maps.

property.name: xmlImportMaps
property.shortdesc: A collection of XML import maps.

property.name: xmlRuleProcessors
property.shortdesc: A collection of XML rule processors.

property.name: flattenerPresets
property.shortdesc: A collection of transparency flattener presets.

property.name: paragraphStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of paragraph style groups.

property.name: characterStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of character style groups.

property.name: tableStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of table style groups.

property.name: cellStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of cell style groups.

property.name: dashedStrokeStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of dashed stroke styles.

property.name: dottedStrokeStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of dotted stroke styles.

property.name: stripedStrokeStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of striped stroke styles.

property.name: paraStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of para style mappings.

property.name: charStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of char style mappings.

property.name: tableStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of table style mappings.

property.name: cellStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of cell style mappings.

property.name: pdfExportPresets
property.shortdesc: A collection of PDF export presets.

property.name: languagesWithVendors
property.shortdesc: A collection of languages with vendors.

property.name: indexingSortOptions
property.shortdesc: A collection of indexing sort options.

property.name: objectStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of object style groups.

property.name: mixedInkGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of mixed ink groups.

property.name: conditions
property.shortdesc: A collection of conditions for conditional text.

property.name: conditionSets
property.shortdesc: A collection of condition sets for conditional text.

property.name: backgroundTasks
property.shortdesc: A collection of background task objects.

property.name: scriptMenuActions
property.shortdesc: A collection of script menu actions.

property.name: findChangeTextOptions
property.shortdesc: Find/change text options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findChangeGrepOptions
property.shortdesc: Find/change grep options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findChangeGlyphOptions
property.shortdesc: Find/change glyph options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findChangeObjectOptions
property.shortdesc: Find/change object options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findTextPreferences
property.shortdesc: Find text preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: changeTextPreferences
property.shortdesc: Change text preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findGrepPreferences
property.shortdesc: Find grep preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: changeGrepPreferences
property.shortdesc: Change grep preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findGlyphPreferences
property.shortdesc: Find glyph preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: changeGlyphPreferences
property.shortdesc: Change glyph preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findObjectPreferences
property.shortdesc: Find object preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: changeObjectPreferences
property.shortdesc: Change object preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findChangeTransliterateOptions
property.shortdesc: Find/change transliterate options. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: findTransliteratePreferences
property.shortdesc: Find transliterate preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: changeTransliteratePreferences
property.shortdesc: Change transliterate preferences. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: userColor
property.shortdesc: The color assigned to the tracked changes and notes created by the user, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as an InCopy UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: userName
property.shortdesc: The user associated with the tracked changes and notes.

property.name: clearOverridesWhenApplyingStyle
property.shortdesc: Clear overrides first before applying object style

property.name: selection
property.shortdesc: The selected object(s). Can also accept: Object or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: activeWindow
property.shortdesc: The front-most window. Can return: Window, LayoutWindow or StoryWindow.

property.name: liveScreenDrawing
property.shortdesc: Delay before mouse operations trigger live screen drawing of page items.

property.name: selectionKeyObject
property.shortdesc: The key object of the selection. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: deleteUnusedTags
method.shortdesc: Deletes unused XML markup tags.

method.name: loadXMLTags
method.shortdesc: Loads a set of XML markup tags from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the file that contains the tags.

method.name: saveXMLTags
method.shortdesc: Saves a set of tags to an external file.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The full path to the file in which to save the tags.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version.

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version.

method.name: mountProject
method.shortdesc: Mount a Version Cue project.

parameters.name: serverURL
parameters.shortdesc: The URL of the Version Cue server containing the project

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the Version Cue project to mount

method.name: importStyles
method.shortdesc: Imports the specified styles.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The types of styles to import.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The file containing the styles you want to import.

parameters.name: globalStrategy
parameters.shortdesc: The resolution strategy to employ for imported styles that have the same names as existing styles.

method.name: exportStrokeStyles
method.shortdesc: Exports stroke styles or presets.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file to save to

parameters.name: strokeStyleList
parameters.shortdesc: The list of stroke styles to save

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: Forcibly save a version

method.name: findText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: changeText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: findGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: changeGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: findGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: changeGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value and replaces the glyphs with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: findObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: changeObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value and replace the objects with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: saveFindChangeQuery
method.shortdesc: Saves the specified find/change query.

parameters.name: queryName
parameters.shortdesc: The query to save.

parameters.name: searchMode
parameters.shortdesc: The search mode.

method.name: loadFindChangeQuery
method.shortdesc: Loads the specified find/change query.

parameters.name: queryName
parameters.shortdesc: The query to load.

parameters.name: searchMode
parameters.shortdesc: The search mode.

method.name: deleteFindChangeQuery
method.shortdesc: Deletes the specified find/change query.

parameters.name: queryName
parameters.shortdesc: The query to delete.

parameters.name: searchMode
parameters.shortdesc: The search mode.

method.name: findTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: changeTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order.

method.name: print
method.shortdesc: Prints the specified file(s).

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: One or more file paths. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: printDialog
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to invoke the print dialog

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: Printer preset to use. Can accept: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset.

method.name: exportPresets
method.shortdesc: Export the presets to a file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The preset format.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file to export to.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comments for this version.

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: Forcibly save a version.

method.name: importFile
method.shortdesc: Imports presets from the specified file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The type of preset to import.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The file to import presets from.

method.name: place
method.shortdesc: Place one or more files following the behavior of the place menu item. This may load the place gun or replace the selected object, depending on current preferences.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.shortdesc: One or more files to place. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the import options dialog

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the placed object(s)

method.name: clearFrameFittingOptions
method.shortdesc: Removes the frame fittings options and resets it to the initial state.

method.name: updateFonts
method.shortdesc: Forces a check for new fonts in the various Fonts folders.

method.name: loadMotionPreset
method.shortdesc: Load motion preset from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Flash motion preset file.

method.name: cut
method.shortdesc: Cuts the selection in the active document window and stores it in the clipboard.

method.name: copy
method.shortdesc: Copies the selection in the active document window to the clipboard.

method.name: paste
method.shortdesc: Pastes data from the clipboard into the active document window.

method.name: pasteInto
method.shortdesc: Pastes data from the clipboard into the selected object in the active document window.

method.name: pasteInPlace
method.shortdesc: Pastes data from the clipboard into the active document window at the same position that the data held in its original document.

method.name: pasteWithoutFormatting
method.shortdesc: Pastes data (minus formatting) from the clipboard into the active document window.

method.name: loadSwatches
method.shortdesc: Load swatches from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The swatch file or InDesign document.

method.name: saveSwatches
method.shortdesc: Saves the specified swatch(es) to a swatchbook file.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The swatchbook file to save to.

parameters.name: swatchList
parameters.shortdesc: The swatch(es) to save.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version.

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version.

method.name: importAdobeSwatchbookSpotColor
method.shortdesc: Imports a spot color swatch from an Adobe color book.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The spot color to load.

method.name: importAdobeSwatchbookProcessColor
method.shortdesc: Imports a process color swatch from a preloaded Adobe color book.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The process color to load.

method.name: loadConditions
method.shortdesc: Load conditions from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the file that contains the conditions.

parameters.name: loadConditionSets
parameters.shortdesc: If true, load the condition sets as well.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the specified object(s).

parameters.name: selectableItems
parameters.shortdesc: The objects to select. Can accept: Object, Array of Objects, NothingEnum enumerator or SelectAll enumerator.

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.shortdesc: The selection status of the Application in relation to previously selected objects.

method.name: applyShortcutSet
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified shortcut set file. No string will apply the default shortcut set.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The shortcut set.

method.name: applyWorkspace
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified workspace.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The workspace.

method.name: applyMenuCustomization
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified menu customization set. An empty string will reset all menus and colorization (Show Full Menus). No string will apply the default menu set.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The menu customization set.

method.name: togglePanelSystemVisibility
method.shortdesc: Toggles the visibility of the entire panel system.

method.name: open
method.shortdesc: Opens the specified document, book, or library.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The file path(s) to the document, book, or library. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: showingWindow
parameters.shortdesc: If true, opens the document in a window. If false, the document is opened but is not displayed in a window.

parameters.name: openOption
parameters.shortdesc: How to open the document.

method.name: quit
method.shortdesc: Quits the application.

parameters.name: saving
parameters.shortdesc: The option to use for saving changes to open documents before quitting.

method.name: doScript
method.shortdesc: Executes the script in the specified language as a single transaction.

parameters.name: script
parameters.shortdesc: The script to execute. Can accept: File, String or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: language
parameters.shortdesc: The language of the script to execute. If not specified, uses the language used to call this method.

parameters.name: withArguments
parameters.shortdesc: An array of arguments passed to the script.

parameters.name: undoMode
parameters.shortdesc: How to undo this script.

parameters.name: undoName
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the undo step for entire script undo mode.

method.name: activate
method.shortdesc: Makes the application the front-most or active window.

method.name: cascadeWindows
method.shortdesc: Cascades all document windows.

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: findKeyStrings
method.shortdesc: Returns the locale-independent string(s) from the internal string localization database that correspond to the specified string (in the current locale).

parameters.name: for
parameters.shortdesc: The string to search for.

method.name: translateKeyString
method.shortdesc: Translates a key string into localized form based on current application locale.

parameters.name: for
parameters.shortdesc: The key string to translate

method.name: undo
method.shortdesc: Undoes the last action.

method.name: redo
method.shortdesc: Redoes the last action.

method.name: tileWindows
method.shortdesc: Tile all document windows

method.name: generateIDMLSchema
method.shortdesc: Generate schema for IDML.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The folder path of the schema.

parameters.name: packageFormat
parameters.shortdesc: If true, generate schema for package format (multiple files). Default value is false.

method.name: cancelAllTasks
method.shortdesc: Cancels all the background tasks.

method.name: waitForAllTasks
method.shortdesc: Waits for all the background tasks to finish.

method.name: setApplicationPreferences
method.shortdesc: Sets the application's preferences.

parameters.name: applicationPreferences
parameters.shortdesc: The IDML defaults file or enumeration. Can accept: File or LanguageAndRegion enumerator.

method.name: performanceMetric
method.shortdesc: Gets the current value of the specified performance metric.

parameters.name: for
parameters.shortdesc: The status to get from InDesign. Can accept: Long Integer or PerformanceMetricOptions enumerator.

method.name: dumpFromMemoryMark
method.shortdesc: Dumps memory allocations from the specified mark.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The mark from which to dump memory.

method.name: dumpBetweenMemoryMarks
method.shortdesc: Dumps memory allocations from all marks in the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The first mark in the range.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The last mark in the range.

method.name: memoryStatistics
method.shortdesc: Gets the memory statistics from the server.

method.name: performanceMetricShortName
method.shortdesc: Gets the short name of the specified performance metric.

parameters.name: for
parameters.shortdesc: The status to get from InDesign. Can accept: Long Integer or PerformanceMetricOptions enumerator.

method.name: performanceMetricLongName
method.shortdesc: Gets the long name of the specified performance metric.

parameters.name: for
parameters.shortdesc: The status to get from InDesign. Can accept: Long Integer or PerformanceMetricOptions enumerator.

method.name: unpackageUCF
method.shortdesc: Unpackage a UCF file into a folder structure.

parameters.name: ucfFile
parameters.shortdesc: The UCF file to be unpackaged.

parameters.name: destinationFolder
parameters.shortdesc: The folder where you would like the UCF file unpackaged to. Will be created if it does not exist.

method.name: packageUCF
method.shortdesc: Package a folder into a UCF file.

parameters.name: sourceFolder
parameters.shortdesc: The folder to be packaged into an IDML file. Does not validate structure of the folder pursuant to the IDML spec. Caller is responsible for making sure the files in the folder are correctly organized.

parameters.name: ucfFile
parameters.shortdesc: The destination UCF file. Will be overwritten if it already exists.

parameters.name: mimeMediaType
parameters.shortdesc: The MIME media type, default value identifies package as IDML.

method.name: loadPreflightProfile
method.shortdesc: Load preflight profile from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The InDesign preflight profile file or InDesign document.

method.name: exportArticleFolio
method.shortdesc: Export the specified documents to an article folio.Note: This method behaves identically to @method(exportMiniFolio), but differs in its return value. @method(exportMiniFolio) returns an array of warning strings whereas this method returns an XML structure.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The location to write the file.

parameters.name: portraitDocument
parameters.shortdesc: The InDesign document for the stack's portrait orientation.

parameters.name: landscapeDocument
parameters.shortdesc: The InDesign document for the stack's landscape orientation.

parameters.name: folioMetadata
parameters.shortdesc: Optional meta data for the mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:String.

parameters.name: miniFolioParams
parameters.shortdesc: Options for exporting a mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type.

method.name: getDigpubVersion
method.shortdesc: Get the current digital publishing version number for the given parameter.

parameters.name: digpubVersion
parameters.shortdesc: Version string(s) to retrieve.

method.name: getSupportedViewerVersions
method.shortdesc: Get the list of viewer versions the digital publishing plugin supports.

method.name: exportMiniFolio
method.shortdesc: Export the specified documents to a mini-folio.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The location to write the file.

parameters.name: portraitDocument
parameters.shortdesc: The InDesign document for the stack's portrait orientation.

parameters.name: landscapeDocument
parameters.shortdesc: The InDesign document for the stack's landscape orientation.

parameters.name: folioMetadata
parameters.shortdesc: Optional meta data for the mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:String.

parameters.name: miniFolioParams
parameters.shortdesc: Options for exporting a mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type.

method.name: exportFolioToPackage
method.shortdesc: Export the selected documents to a compressed folio file that contains compressed mini folios.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The location to write the package.

parameters.name: miniFolioList
parameters.shortdesc: The mini folio(es) to add to the folio. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: folioMetadata
parameters.shortdesc: Meta data for the folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:String.

parameters.name: exportFolioParams
parameters.shortdesc: Additional options for export folios. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type.

method.name: exportFolioToDirectory
method.shortdesc: Export the selected documents to a directory.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The directory to write the folio.

parameters.name: miniFolioList
parameters.shortdesc: The mini folio(es) to add to the folio. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: folioMetadata
parameters.shortdesc: Meta data for the folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:String.

parameters.name: exportFolioParams
parameters.shortdesc: Additional options for export folios. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type.

method.name: exportFolioToDirectoryPackage
method.shortdesc: Export the selected documents to a compressed folio file that contains non-compressed mini folios.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The location to write the package.

parameters.name: miniFolioList
parameters.shortdesc: The mini folio(es) to add to the folio. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: folioMetadata
parameters.shortdesc: Meta data for the folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:String.

parameters.name: exportFolioParams
parameters.shortdesc: Additional options for export folios. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type.

method.name: getAllOverlays
method.shortdesc: Get all overlays.

parameters.name: portraitDocumentForCheckingOverlays
parameters.shortdesc: The portrait document for checking overlays.

parameters.name: landscapeDocumentForCheckingOverlays
parameters.shortdesc: The landscape document for checking overlays.

parameters.name: miniFolioParams
parameters.shortdesc: Options for exporting a mini folio. Can accept: Ordered array containing dataField:String, dataValue:Any Type.

method.name: createCustomMiniFolio
method.shortdesc: Create a mini-folio out of asset and overlay descriptions.Schema for the mini folio description:|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||| contentstackid | string | yes | The explicit ID to be used for this stack || tocImage | file | no | The TOC image for the mini-folio || narrowdimension | int | no | Targetted export size, measured along narrow dimension || widedimension | int | no | Targetted export size, measured along wide dimension || smoothscrolling | @enum(SmoothScrollingOptions) | no | The smooth scrolling behavior for this stack (default is noSmoothScroll) || locationforgeneratedassets | file | no | If included, this is an existing directory where the generated assets should be created. || overlays | array | no | see the SDK Overlay Builder APIs || assets | array | yes | The assets for the mini - folio, described below. || assetDependencies | array | no | Files that are needed by the asset, that will be included in the package but not the manifest. || metadata | array | no | The metadata for the mini-folio described below. || showprogressbar | boolean | no | Either true or false to indicate whether we should show a progress bar (default is false) || targetviewerversion | string | no | If provided (in the form "major.minor.revision") a folio compatible with the viewer version is produced. If omitted, the latest folio format is produced. | CS5 |The following are fields in the array for "assets":|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||| file | file | yes | The asset file || type | string | yes | The asset file type, either "web" for HTML or "image" for a raster || width | int | yes | The asset width || height | int | yes | The asset height || orientation | string | yes | The asset orientation, either "portrait" or "landscape" || thumbnail | file | no | A thumbnail of the asset to be used in browse mode || scrubber | file | no | A thumbnail of the asset to be used in scrubber mode |The following are fields in the array for "assetDependencies":|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||| file | file | no | The dependent file || relativePath | string | no | The relative path to the file, for use in the package |The following are fields in the array for "metadata":|| Key || Type || Required? || Description ||| any string | string or boolean | no | any key/value where the key is a string, and the value is either a string or a boolean, such as those described in "export folio meta data" |

parameters.name: miniFolioDescription
parameters.shortdesc: A dictionary describing the custom mini folio to create. Can accept: Ordered array containing key:String, value:Boolean, Long Integer, Long Long Integer, String, File or Array of Any Types.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The location to write the file.

method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Application.
